extDesc.message: Contextual menu addition to popout tabs in a new window for easier screen-sharing of sites and documents in Google Hangouts.

menuOpenWindow.message: Popout current tab into new window

menuOpenPresent.message: Popout current tab into new window with go/present

menuEditPresent.message: Enter Present Mode in current window

menuEditPresentAlt.message: Enter Edit Mode in current window
